Tudi dacarji so ljudje
Na Fursu zbirajo hrano in potrebščine za ljudi v stiski. Decembra bodo obdarili otroke.
07 Nov 2019, 12:13 by Tomica Šuljić



Akcija se imenuje Furs smo ljudje. FOTO: Furs



Generalna direktorica Fursa Jana Ahčin je predala nabirko. FOTO: Furs



Generalni finančni urad je zbiral prvi in dal zgled preostalim 16. FOTO: Furs



Na akcijo Furs smo ljudje so dacarji upravičeno ponosni. FOTO: Furs


LJUBLJANA – Finančna uprava (Furs) oziroma dacarji, kot jih marsikdo imenuje, v vsakdanjiku ne spada med najbolj priljubljene državne organe; deloma gre razlog za to pripisati dejstvu, da zaradi narave njenega dela lahko trpi marsikatera denarnica. To je kanček razvidno tudi z njihovih strani na družabnem omrežju facebook: če slovenski policiji sledi 31.000 ljudi, naši vojski pa 21.000, ima Furs le nekaj nad 3000 sledilcev. Toda fursovci so prav na facebooku pridobili kar precej simpatij navadnih občank in občanov zaradi njihove dobrodelne note – v zadnjih dveh mesecih namreč pogosto objavljajo fotografije pomoči, ki so jo sami nabrali.


Generalna direktorica Fursa Jana Ahčin je predala nabirko. FOTO: Furs

Konec avgusta so namreč začeli projekt FURS smo ljudje. »Na Fursu delamo le ljudje, ki opravljamo svoje delo, ob tem pa znamo stopiti skupaj in narediti nekaj dobrega. Dobrega za ljudi, ki so se znašli v takšni ali drugačni stiski,« pojasnjujejo dacarji. Zbirajo hrano, šolske potrebščine, otroška oblačila, higienske pripomočke, likovne oziroma ustvarjalne pripomočke, igračke, pa posteljnino ter brisače. »Vsak mesec bo sredstva zbiral drug finančni urad, teh je po Sloveniji 17. Novembra bomo vsi uradi zbirali igračke oziroma darila za otroke, ki jih bodo prejeli decembra.«
17 uradov Fursa je v Sloveniji.
Svoje akcije niso obešali na veliki zvon; le na strani na facebooku objavljajo svoje nabirke, ob katerih se znajdejo čustveni zapisi kot: »Tisti, ki nas spremljate, veste, da nam ta projekt ogromno pomeni.« Da nabrana pomoč res pride do tistih, ki so je najbolj potrebni, so se povezali z Zvezo prijateljev mladine Moste-Polje, v okviru njihovega projekta Veriga dobrih ljudi ter Čarobna zima. S tem, pravijo, so se vključili v celostni program pomoči, ki ga je ZPM Moste-Polje razvil skozi dolgoletno sodelovanje z družinami: »Poleg tega, da je v nas vzbudil dober občutek, da nekomu omogočamo kanček boljše življenje, nas je tudi zbližal.«
text:
Dacars are people too
At Furs, they collect food and supplies for people in need. They will be gifting children in December.
07 Nov 2019, 13:13 by Tomica Šuljić



The action is called Furs We Are People. PHOTO: Furs



Furs CEO Jana Ahčin handed over the file. PHOTO: Furs



The General Finance Office collected the first one and set an example for the remaining 16



We are rightly proud of the action Furs we are people. PHOTO: Furs


LJUBLJANA - The Financial Administration (Furs), or the donors as many people call it, is not one of the most popular government bodies in everyday life; this is partly due to the fact that many wallets can suffer because of the nature of its work. This is also evident from their Facebook page: If 31,000 people are followed by Slovenian police and 21,000 by our army, Furs has just over 3,000 followers. But the Furs have received quite a lot of sympathy from ordinary citizens on the facebook because of their charitable note - in the last two months, they often post photos of help they have collected.


Furs CEO Jana Ahčin handed over the file. PHOTO: Furs

Namely, at the end of August, we started the FURS We Are People project. “At Furs, we only work for people who do our jobs, and at the same time we know how to get together and do something good. Good for people who are in this or that distress, "the dacars explain. They collect food, school supplies, children's clothing, hygiene supplies, fine arts and crafts, toys, linen and towels. "Each month, another financial bureau will raise funds, which are across Slovenia on November 17. All offices will collect toys or gifts for children, which they will receive in December."
There are 17 Furs offices in Slovenia.
They didn't hang their campaigns on the big bell; only on their facebook page are they posting their collections, which find emotional records like, “Those of you who follow us know that this project means a lot to us.” The help that really comes to those who need it the most connected with the Friends of Moste-Polje Youth Association, as part of their Chain of Good People and Magic Winter project. In doing so, they say, they have become involved in the comprehensive assistance program developed by ZPM Moste-Polje through many years of cooperation with families: “In addition to giving us a good sense of giving someone a better life, he also brought us closer . "
